mapper.update:
update projectbug
projectId = #{projectId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
demandId = #{demandId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
projectTaskId = #{projectTaskId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
bugTitle = #{bugTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
state = #{state,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
descs = #{descs,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
grade = #{grade,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
operatingSystem = #{operatingSystem,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
browser = #{browser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
enclosure = #{enclosure,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
fileName = #{fileName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
assginor = #{assginor,jdbcType=INTEGER},
creatPeople = #{creatPeople,jdbcType=INTEGER},
createTime = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
endTime = #{endTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
completPeople = #{completPeople,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update projectbug set projectId = #{projectId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, demandId = #{demandId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, projectTaskId = #{projectTaskId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, bugTitle = #{bugTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, state = #{state,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, descs = #{descs,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, grade = #{grade,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, operatingSystem = #{operatingSystem,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, browser = #{browser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, enclosure = #{enclosure,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, fileName = #{fileName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, assginor = #{assginor,jdbcType=INTEGER}, creatPeople = #{creatPeople,jdbcType=INTEGER}, createTime = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, endTime = #{endTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, completPeople = #{completPeople,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: SELECT pb.id,pb.grade,pb.bugTitle,pb.state,pb.creatPeople AS createPeopeleId,tu.`name` AS creatPeople, pb.createTime,pb.assginor AS assginorId,tu2.`name` AS assginor,pb.completPeople AS completPeopleId,tu3.`name` AS completPeople, pb.endTime,pb.demandId,d.demandName,pb.projectTaskId,pdy.taskName AS projectTaskName,pb.descs, pb.operatingSystem,pb.browser,pb.enclosure,pb.fileName FROM projectbug pb LEFT JOIN t_user tu ON tu.id=pb.creatPeople LEFT JOIN t_user tu2 ON tu2.id=pb.assginor LEFT JOIN t_user tu3 ON tu3.id=pb.completPeople LEFT JOIN demand d ON d.id=pb.demandId LEFT JOIN projectdusty pdy ON pdy.id=pb.projectTaskId WHERE pb.id=#{id}
